Package nl.naturalis.nda.export.dwca

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Brahms
    BRAHMS Description: Match the fields what is described in the botany.properties
    and set value to the CSV datarow
    Core
    CORE Description: Class to create the element header of the Meta.xml file.
    CsvFileWriter
    CsvFileWriter Description: Methods to write data for CSV(Comma Separated Values) using the StringBuilder Class.
    DwCAExporter
    DwCAExporter Description: Create a new DwCA export tool for the NBA Query the data from JSON Docs and export data values to CSV.
    ExportDwCAUtilities
    ExportDwCAUtilities Description: String Utilites for the StringBuilder Class to Write data to a CSV file Different method used in the DwCAExporter tool
    Field
    FIELD Description: Class to create the Index-, term- and field element of the Meta.xml file.
    Fieldmapping
    FieldMapping Description: FieldMapping class for BRAHMS, GEOLOGY and ZOOLOGY class
    Files
    FILES Description: Class to create the files- and location element under the core element of the Meta.xml file.
    FindFile
    FindFile Description: Methods what is used in the DwCAExporter class method
    private static String getEmlFileName(String emlDir, String emlfilename)
    Geology
    GEOLOGY Description: Match the fields what is described in the geology.properties
    and set the value to the CSV datarow
    Id
    ID Description: Methods what is used in the DwCAExporter- and Core class method
    public void exportDwca(String zipFileName, String namecollectiontype, String totalsize) throws Exception
    Meta
    META Description: Methods what is used in the DwCAExporter class methods
    public void exportDwca(String zipFileName, String namecollectiontype, String totalsize) throws Exception private static void dwcaObjectToXML(Meta meta)
    ZipDwCA
    ZIPDwCA Description: Methods what is used in the DwCAExporter class methods
    public static void createZipFiles(String zipFileName)
    Zoology
    ZOOLOGY Description: Match the fields what is described in the zoology.properties
    and set the value to the CSV datarow
